title: Welcome To My Blog
text:
This is the first post in a Quarto blog. Welcome!

Since this post doesn’t specify an explicit image, the first image in the post will be used in the listing page of posts.

title: About
text:
Hi! I’m Laia Domenech Burin, a sociologist and data scientist dedicated to leveraging data for societal impact. I hold a Licentiate in Sociology from the University of Buenos Aires and am pursuing a Master’s in Data Science for Public Policy at the Hertie School of Governance.
My experience spans roles in academia, consulting, and advocacy. I am currently working as a Research Assistant at the LMU Munich, in cool projects as extracting CO2 emissions from company reports and digitization of building plans for sustainability measures. I am also interested in the analysis of hate speech and its relationship to new right-wing parties. Find my CV here.
As an educator, I teach Introduction to R for Social Scientists with a critic perspective.
